name: Avalanche (Chaplisk)
description:
In this arcade game made for the Ludum Dare 34 2015, you control a snowball smashing everyone and avoiding the obstacles on his way to get bigger and bigger ! And if you are big enough when you hit an obstacle : MultiSnowBall !

My job on this game : Game Design / Level Design

Made in 48 hours with Guillaume Laugé, Kamil Nahouri, Jean-Louis Boudrand, Antoine Tirmarche and myself, Simon-Pierre Mattei.
